testimonials-section-p: Over 2,000 physicians have transformed their routine with MedReport AI
testimonials-section-quote1: I cut my reporting time by 75 %. I can now see more patients with the same quality.
testimonials-section-quote2: The AI’s accuracy is impressive. I rarely need to tweak the generated reports.

pricing-section-p: Start free and scale as you grow
faq-section-question1: How does the AI analyze exams?
faq-section-answer1: Our AI was trained on millions of annotated medical images. It detects patterns and generates structured reports based on medical protocols, always under physician supervision.
faq-section-answer2: Yes. We use end-to-end encryption and strictly follow GDPR. Data stay on secure regional servers and are never shared with third parties.
faq-section-answer3: Absolutely. Create templates with your logo, layout and specific fields.
faq-section-answer4: Implementation is fast—on average clients are live in 2-3 days including team training and initial setup.
faq-section-question5: Does it integrate with hospital systems?
faq-section-answer5: Yes. We integrate with major HIS/RIS/PACS via standard APIs and guide you through the whole process.
faq-section-answer6: Yes. No lock-in. Cancel whenever you want; your data remain available for 90 days for export.
faq-section-answer7: Our AI exceeds 99.2 % accuracy in detecting relevant findings, but we always recommend physician review of generated reports.
end-section-p: Join 2,000+ physicians who transformed their workflow. Try it free for 7 days and feel the difference.
footer-p1: Transforming medicine with AI for faster, more accurate reports.
